project.name: Tryambakam Noesis - Wave 2: TypeScript Engines + Workflows + Polish
prerequisites: noesis-api fully operational with all routes
assumptions: TypeScript engines can run on separate port (3001)
HTTP bridge latency acceptable for archetypal engines (<50ms overhead)
VedicClock-TCM integration data available from wisdom-docs
Biofield PIP device not required for initial implementation (mock data OK)
risks: TypeScript engine performance may require optimization
Workflow synthesis logic requires deep understanding of cross-engine patterns
Biofield/Face Reading may need specialized hardware integration

phases.name: Wave 2 Phase 1: TypeScript Engines Foundation
phases.objective: Implement Bun HTTP server and first 2 TypeScript engines (Tarot, I-Ching)

tasks.title: Create ts-engines project structure
tasks.deliverable: ts-engines/ directory with package.json, tsconfig.json, Bun setup
tasks.acceptance: bun install && bun run dev starts server

tasks.title: Define TypeScript EngineInput/EngineOutput types
tasks.deliverable: TypeScript interfaces matching Rust ConsciousnessEngine trait
tasks.acceptance: Type-safe request/response handling

tasks.title: Implement Bun HTTP server with routing
tasks.deliverable: Hono/Express server on port 3001 with /engines/:id/calculate routes
tasks.acceptance: Server responds to POST requests with JSON

tasks.title: Implement health check endpoint for TS server
tasks.deliverable: GET /health returns server status
tasks.acceptance: Returns {status: healthy, engines: [...]}

tasks.title: Load Tarot wisdom data (rider-waite.json)
tasks.deliverable: Load 78 cards from wisdom-docs/tarot/rider_waite.json
tasks.acceptance: All cards accessible with upright/reversed meanings

tasks.title: Implement Tarot card shuffling algorithm
tasks.deliverable: Fisher-Yates shuffle with seeded randomness
tasks.acceptance: Reproducible spreads given same seed (for caching)

tasks.title: Implement Tarot spread layouts
tasks.deliverable: Support 5 spreads: Single Card, 3-Card (past/present/future), Celtic Cross, Relationship, Career
tasks.acceptance: Each spread returns positioned cards with meanings

tasks.title: Implement Tarot upright/reversed logic
tasks.deliverable: Randomly determine card orientation (50% upright, 50% reversed)
tasks.acceptance: Reversed cards return reversed_meaning from wisdom data

tasks.title: Implement Tarot witness prompt generation
tasks.deliverable: Generate inquiry prompts based on drawn cards
tasks.acceptance: Prompts ask user to witness card's archetypal energy in their life

tasks.title: Implement Tarot engine class
tasks.deliverable: TarotEngine class with calculate() method matching interface
tasks.acceptance: Returns EngineOutput with spread result + witness prompt

tasks.title: Register Tarot engine with TS server router
tasks.deliverable: POST /engines/tarot/calculate routes to TarotEngine
tasks.acceptance: Can call Tarot engine via HTTP

tasks.title: Test Tarot engine via Rust bridge
tasks.deliverable: Integration test calling Tarot through noesis-bridge
tasks.acceptance: Rust API can proxy Tarot requests to TS server

tasks.title: Register Tarot bridge engine with orchestrator
tasks.deliverable: BridgeEngine for Tarot added to orchestrator
tasks.acceptance: POST /api/v1/engines/tarot/calculate works end-to-end

tasks.title: Load I-Ching wisdom data (hexagrams_complete.json)
tasks.deliverable: Load 64 hexagrams with judgment, image, line meanings
tasks.acceptance: All hexagrams accessible with full text

tasks.title: Implement three-coin method for I-Ching
tasks.deliverable: Traditional coin toss method generates 6 lines (yin/yang, stable/changing)
tasks.acceptance: Produces valid hexagram with changing lines

tasks.title: Implement hexagram transformation logic
tasks.deliverable: Generate relating hexagram from changing lines
tasks.acceptance: Returns primary + relating hexagram pair

tasks.title: Implement I-Ching witness prompt generation
tasks.deliverable: Generate prompts based on hexagram wisdom
tasks.acceptance: Prompts invite reflection on situation without prescription

tasks.title: Implement I-Ching engine class
tasks.deliverable: IChingEngine with calculate() method
tasks.acceptance: Returns hexagram reading with witness prompt

tasks.title: Register I-Ching with TS server and orchestrator
tasks.deliverable: I-Ching engine operational via bridge
tasks.acceptance: POST /api/v1/engines/i-ching/calculate works

tasks.title: Load Enneagram wisdom data (types.json)
tasks.deliverable: Load 9 types with wings, integration, disintegration paths
tasks.acceptance: All type data accessible

tasks.title: Implement Enneagram assessment questionnaire
tasks.deliverable: Multi-question assessment scoring algorithm
tasks.acceptance: Returns likely type + wing based on responses

tasks.title: Implement Enneagram witness prompt generation
tasks.deliverable: Prompts based on type's core fear/desire
tasks.acceptance: Invites witnessing patterns without identifying as type

tasks.title: Implement Enneagram engine class
tasks.deliverable: EnneagramEngine with assessment + type description
tasks.acceptance: Returns type analysis with witness prompt

tasks.title: Register Enneagram engine
tasks.deliverable: Enneagram operational via bridge
tasks.acceptance: POST /api/v1/engines/enneagram/calculate works

tasks.title: Implement Sacred Geometry engine stub
tasks.deliverable: Basic Sacred Geometry engine (visual generation deferred to future)
tasks.acceptance: Returns sacred geometry metadata + witness prompt

tasks.title: Implement Sigil Forge engine stub
tasks.deliverable: Basic Sigil Forge engine (visual generation deferred)
tasks.acceptance: Returns sigil metadata + witness prompt

tasks.title: Write integration tests for all TS engines
tasks.deliverable: Test suite for Tarot, I-Ching, Enneagram, SacredGeo, Sigil via API
tasks.acceptance: All 5 TS engines return valid responses

tasks.title: Define VedicClock-TCM data structures
tasks.deliverable: Rust structs for OrganClock, Dosha, TimeWindow
tasks.acceptance: Serde structs for TCM 24-hour cycle + Vedic time

tasks.title: Load TCM organ clock wisdom data
tasks.deliverable: Load tcm_organ_clock.json with 12 2-hour windows
tasks.acceptance: Organ clock data accessible

tasks.title: Load Panchanga qualities wisdom data
tasks.deliverable: Load panchanga_qualities.json with Tithi/Nakshatra/Yoga/Karana meanings
tasks.acceptance: Panchanga quality data accessible

tasks.title: Implement current organ clock calculation
tasks.deliverable: Given current time, return active organ + peak energy + practices
tasks.acceptance: Correctly maps 24-hour clock to organ windows

tasks.title: Integrate Panchanga temporal data
tasks.deliverable: Combine current Panchanga (from engine-panchanga) with TCM organ clock
tasks.acceptance: Returns unified temporal recommendations

tasks.title: Implement dosha-organ correspondence
tasks.deliverable: Map Vata/Pitta/Kapha to TCM organs and elements
tasks.acceptance: Cross-system correlation table operational

tasks.title: Implement optimal timing recommendations
tasks.deliverable: Synthesize Vedic + TCM for activity timing (meditation, work, rest, etc)
tasks.acceptance: Returns hour-by-hour recommendations with rationale

tasks.title: Implement VedicClock witness prompt generation
tasks.deliverable: Prompts invite witnessing body's natural rhythms
tasks.acceptance: Asks user to observe energy levels at different times

tasks.title: Implement ConsciousnessEngine trait for VedicClock
tasks.deliverable: VedicClockEngine implements trait
tasks.acceptance: Returns temporal optimization + witness prompt

tasks.title: Register VedicClock engine with orchestrator
tasks.deliverable: VedicClockEngine added to registry
tasks.acceptance: POST /api/v1/engines/vedic-clock/calculate works

tasks.title: Write integration tests for VedicClock engine
tasks.deliverable: Test VedicClock temporal recommendations
tasks.acceptance: Validates Vedic + TCM synthesis logic

tasks.title: Create Biofield engine stub structure
tasks.deliverable: engine-biofield crate with ConsciousnessEngine impl
tasks.acceptance: Returns placeholder biofield data + witness prompt

tasks.title: Load biofield algorithm wisdom data
tasks.deliverable: Load biofield_spatial_algorithms.json and temporal
tasks.acceptance: Algorithm metadata accessible

tasks.title: Implement mock biofield metrics calculation
tasks.deliverable: Generate mock fractal dimension, entropy, coherence scores
tasks.acceptance: Returns plausible biofield metrics structure

tasks.title: Implement biofield witness prompt generation
tasks.deliverable: Prompts invite witnessing breath/energy field states
tasks.acceptance: Asks user to observe somatic sensations

tasks.title: Register Biofield engine (stub mode)
tasks.deliverable: BiofieldEngine added to orchestrator
tasks.acceptance: POST /api/v1/engines/biofield/calculate returns mock data

tasks.title: Create Face Reading engine stub structure
tasks.deliverable: engine-face-reading crate with ConsciousnessEngine impl
tasks.acceptance: Returns placeholder face reading data + witness prompt

tasks.title: Load face reading wisdom data
tasks.deliverable: Load facial_landmark_mappings, tcm_face_correlations, vedic_face_correlations
tasks.acceptance: Face zone data accessible

tasks.title: Implement mock face analysis
tasks.deliverable: Generate mock constitution/personality analysis
tasks.acceptance: Returns plausible face reading structure

tasks.title: Implement face reading witness prompt generation
tasks.deliverable: Prompts invite observing facial features as mirrors
tasks.acceptance: Asks user to witness constitution patterns

tasks.title: Register Face Reading engine (stub mode)
tasks.deliverable: FaceReadingEngine added to orchestrator
tasks.acceptance: POST /api/v1/engines/face-reading/calculate returns mock data

tasks.title: Document stub engine future implementation plans
tasks.deliverable: Document hardware requirements and future roadmap for Biofield/Face Reading
tasks.acceptance: Clear documentation on what's stub vs. full implementation

phases.name: Wave 2 Phase 3: Multi-Engine Workflows
phases.objective: Implement 6 pre-defined workflows with synthesis logic

tasks.title: Define Workflow data structures
tasks.deliverable: WorkflowDefinition, WorkflowOutput, SynthesisResult structs
tasks.acceptance: Type-safe workflow representation

tasks.title: Implement workflow registry
tasks.deliverable: HashMap of 6 predefined workflows with metadata
tasks.acceptance: Workflows discoverable via /api/v1/workflows

tasks.title: Implement birth-blueprint workflow
tasks.deliverable: Numerology + HD + Vimshottari in parallel, synthesize results
tasks.acceptance: Returns unified birth blueprint with cross-engine insights

tasks.title: Implement synthesis logic for birth-blueprint
tasks.deliverable: Find patterns across Life Path (numerology), Type (HD), Current Dasha (Vimshottari)
tasks.acceptance: Synthesis highlights aligned vs. conflicting themes

tasks.title: Implement daily-practice workflow
tasks.deliverable: Panchanga + VedicClock-TCM + Biorhythm in parallel
tasks.acceptance: Returns optimal timing for today's activities

tasks.title: Implement synthesis logic for daily-practice
tasks.deliverable: Combine temporal recommendations from 3 systems
tasks.acceptance: Synthesis finds optimal windows across all three engines

tasks.title: Implement decision-support workflow
tasks.deliverable: Tarot + I-Ching + HD Authority in parallel
tasks.acceptance: Returns multi-perspective guidance on decision

tasks.title: Implement synthesis logic for decision-support
tasks.deliverable: Synthesize archetypal (Tarot/I-Ching) with bodily authority (HD)
tasks.acceptance: Synthesis highlights aligned guidance vs. tensions

tasks.title: Write witness prompts for workflows
tasks.deliverable: Workflow-level witness prompts based on synthesis
tasks.acceptance: Prompts invite witnessing cross-engine patterns

tasks.title: Test parallel execution performance
tasks.deliverable: Verify workflows complete in ~max(engine_time), not sum
tasks.acceptance: 3-engine workflow takes ~200ms, not 600ms

tasks.title: Implement self-inquiry workflow
tasks.deliverable: Gene Keys + Enneagram + enhanced witness prompts
tasks.acceptance: Returns shadow-work focused synthesis

tasks.title: Implement synthesis logic for self-inquiry
tasks.deliverable: Map Gene Keys shadows to Enneagram core fears
tasks.acceptance: Synthesis reveals unconscious pattern correlations

tasks.title: Implement creative-expression workflow
tasks.deliverable: Sigil Forge + Sacred Geometry + (future Raaga stub)
tasks.acceptance: Returns generative guidance

tasks.title: Implement synthesis logic for creative-expression
tasks.deliverable: Combine symbolic/geometric outputs for creative prompts
tasks.acceptance: Synthesis suggests creative directions

tasks.title: Implement full-spectrum workflow
tasks.deliverable: All 13 engines in parallel (8 Rust + 5 TS)
tasks.acceptance: Returns complete self-portrait across all systems

tasks.title: Implement synthesis logic for full-spectrum
tasks.deliverable: Cross-engine pattern detection across all 13 outputs
tasks.acceptance: Identifies themes appearing in 3+ engines

tasks.title: Implement workflow caching strategy
tasks.deliverable: Cache workflow results separately from individual engines
tasks.acceptance: Workflow cache keys based on input + engine versions

tasks.title: Write integration tests for all workflows
tasks.deliverable: E2E tests for all 6 workflows via API
tasks.acceptance: All workflows return valid synthesized results

tasks.title: Benchmark full-spectrum workflow performance
tasks.deliverable: Measure parallel execution of 13 engines
tasks.acceptance: Full-spectrum completes in <2 seconds (not 13x individual time)

tasks.title: Document workflow synthesis patterns
tasks.deliverable: .context/workflows.md with synthesis logic explained
tasks.acceptance: Documents how cross-engine validation works

phases.name: Wave 2 Phase 4: Production Readiness + Polish
phases.objective: Deployment config, monitoring, observability, comprehensive E2E tests, documentation

tasks.title: Create production Dockerfile multi-stage build
tasks.deliverable: Optimized Docker image <500MB with noesis-api binary
tasks.acceptance: Production image builds and runs successfully

tasks.title: Create Kubernetes deployment manifests
tasks.deliverable: K8s Deployment, Service, Ingress, ConfigMap, Secrets for noesis-api + TS server
tasks.acceptance: kubectl apply deploys full stack

tasks.title: Configure horizontal pod autoscaling
tasks.deliverable: HPA based on CPU/memory metrics
tasks.acceptance: Pods scale 1-10 based on load

tasks.title: Configure Redis cluster for production
tasks.deliverable: Redis Sentinel or Redis Cluster for L2 cache HA
tasks.acceptance: Redis failover works without data loss

tasks.title: Configure Postgres replication
tasks.deliverable: Primary-replica Postgres setup for read scaling
tasks.acceptance: Read queries use replica, writes use primary

tasks.title: Set up Prometheus monitoring
tasks.deliverable: Prometheus scraping /metrics endpoint, storing time-series
tasks.acceptance: Metrics visible in Prometheus UI

tasks.title: Set up Grafana dashboards
tasks.deliverable: Dashboards for: API latency, engine performance, cache hit rates, error rates
tasks.acceptance: Real-time visualization of key metrics

tasks.title: Configure structured logging with ELK/Loki
tasks.deliverable: Centralized log aggregation with searchable JSON logs
tasks.acceptance: Can query logs by user_id, engine_id, trace_id

tasks.title: Set up distributed tracing with Jaeger
tasks.deliverable: Trace requests through orchestrator → engines → cache
tasks.acceptance: Can visualize full request path in Jaeger UI

tasks.title: Configure alerting rules
tasks.deliverable: Alerts for: High error rate, latency > SLA, cache hit < 70%, pod crashes
tasks.acceptance: Test alerts fire and route to Slack/PagerDuty

tasks.title: Implement health check probes for K8s
tasks.deliverable: Liveness probe checks app alive, readiness checks dependencies
tasks.acceptance: K8s restarts unhealthy pods, routes traffic only to ready pods

tasks.title: Configure TLS/SSL certificates
tasks.deliverable: Cert-manager auto-provisioning Let's Encrypt certs
tasks.acceptance: API accessible via HTTPS

tasks.title: Set up CI/CD pipeline
tasks.deliverable: GitHub Actions: test → build → push image → deploy to staging/prod
tasks.acceptance: Push to main triggers automated deployment

tasks.title: Write E2E test suite for all 13 engines
tasks.deliverable: Comprehensive E2E tests covering happy path + error cases
tasks.acceptance: All 13 engines tested via API with various inputs

tasks.title: Write E2E test suite for all 6 workflows
tasks.deliverable: E2E tests for all workflows with synthesis validation
tasks.acceptance: All workflows tested with assertion on synthesis output

tasks.title: Write load tests for production readiness
tasks.deliverable: k6/Locust tests simulating 1000 concurrent users
tasks.acceptance: System maintains <1s p95 latency under load

tasks.title: Write chaos engineering tests
tasks.deliverable: Tests for: Redis down, Postgres down, TS server down, pod crashes
tasks.acceptance: System degrades gracefully, no cascading failures

tasks.title: Write security penetration tests
tasks.deliverable: Test auth bypass, SQL injection, XSS, CSRF, rate limit bypass
tasks.acceptance: No critical vulnerabilities found

tasks.title: Perform accuracy validation sweep
tasks.deliverable: Re-validate HD, Gene Keys, Vimshottari against reference data
tasks.acceptance: 100% accuracy maintained for astronomical engines

tasks.title: Update .context/architecture with final patterns
tasks.deliverable: Document as-built architecture with all engines + workflows
tasks.acceptance: .context reflects final implementation

tasks.title: Write .context/engines docs for all engines
tasks.deliverable: Individual engine docs in .context/engines/ for all 13
tasks.acceptance: Each engine has calculation details, wisdom data sources, witness prompt patterns

tasks.title: Write .context/workflows synthesis documentation
tasks.deliverable: Document synthesis patterns for all 6 workflows
tasks.acceptance: Explains cross-engine validation logic

tasks.title: Write API documentation with examples
tasks.deliverable: Complete API docs with curl examples for all endpoints
tasks.acceptance: Developers can integrate without asking questions

tasks.title: Write deployment guide
tasks.deliverable: Step-by-step guide for deploying to production
tasks.acceptance: DevOps can deploy following guide

tasks.title: Write troubleshooting guide
tasks.deliverable: Common issues + solutions (cache misses, Swiss Eph errors, TS bridge failures)
tasks.acceptance: Covers top 10 common issues

tasks.title: Perform final code review and cleanup
tasks.deliverable: Remove TODO comments, dead code, improve inline docs
tasks.acceptance: Codebase ready for external contributions

tasks.title: Create release notes and migration guide
tasks.deliverable: Release notes for Selemene → Tryambakam migration
tasks.acceptance: Existing users know how to upgrade
